Lower School Site Coordinator, Toni Winston

h2.span: Welcome to Sankofa Freedom Cyber School - Phase 2!

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Welcome back to the Sankofa Freedom Academy Cyber Experience- Phase 2. We hope that everyone had lots of fun during spring break and that your children are ready and eager to return to us. As many of you know, Governor Wolf announced that all schools are closed for the remainder of the year. What he meant was all school buildings are closed, but Sankofa Freedom Academy is open for teaching and learning. We have put together a plan Continuity of Education plan, which is located on our website and explains what we hope to do for the rest of the school year.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We have planned an educational program for your children that is online and includes videos and live class presentations with your children’s facilitators. We listened to many of you and have created a new schedule that we hope you and your child will find more manageable and flexible. We have provided additional computers to those who needed them as well as composition books for your children to write in. Finally, our scholars from grades 4-8 have been given their communal texts to read.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: We implore you to please send your child to school every day. Begin each day with morning circle and if you get up late or miss it, please play the video later. You never know, your child’s teacher may have selected him or her to get a shout out by the Dean of their unit. After morning circle, please have your child follow his or her new roster on the lower, middle, and upper school cyber link

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Finally, please make sure your child turns in his or her work every. If the work is in their composition book, take a picture and send it the grade level email or directly to their teacher. We intend to give your scholar additional credit on top of the grade that they earned from September until March 13. We are presently in the process of deciding how and when we will inform you of your child’s status based on their cumulative grade for the year, so stay tuned. Please reach out to us if you have any questions, concerns, need some help, or just need someone to talk to. We are here for you and your children.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Stay safe; take care, and let’s grow and glow together in our cyberspace.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
